title: How to Make Cinnamon Roll Biscuits

steps.headline: Make your favorite biscuit recipe.
steps.description: Biscuits that you can roll out, as well as drop biscuits work. Tinned biscuits from the store will work just as well if you really want to simplify it.

steps.headline: Melt some butter.
steps.description: Real butter is preferable, but margarine will work.

steps.headline: Have a bowl of sugar/cinnamon mixed up.
steps.description: Make it as sugary or cinnamon as you want.

steps.headline: Dip the cut biscuit or the spooned biscuit (drop biscuit) into the butter.
Roll it in the cinnamon mixture.
Bake according to your biscuit recipe.

text: Make your favorite biscuit recipe. Biscuits that you can roll out, as well as drop biscuits work. Tinned biscuits from the store will work just as well if you really want to simplify it. Melt some butter. Real butter is preferable, but margarine will work. Have a bowl of sugar/cinnamon mixed up. Make it as sugary or cinnamon as you want. Dip the cut biscuit or the spooned biscuit (drop biscuit) into the butter.  Roll it in the cinnamon mixture.  Bake according to your biscuit recipe.  Serve hot.
